fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, mark a player to Grapple, role-blocking them.
- When you possess the Ball and kill someone, you kill the last Grappled player as well as your second target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Factional chat
- Gains powerful defense if carrying the Ball
- Replaces abilities with factional kill if carrying the Ball

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who opposes the team.
